Pintmaster

Funny Homeless guys sign

This is the weirdest, creepiest sign I have seen. Luckily I had my camera, so I snapped a shot.

Help if you wanna help me with money and may all of you that are with me be forever. Signed, the true creator Thank you for the shoes and t-shirts but now I just need 4 or 7 black pants size 40 waist and 30 length and 4 or 7 black or yellow long sleeve shirts **? and 7 or 10 pair of black socks to put on me when I sit west north so as when I perspire it will help reflect all spells from my powers and also if you could bring me 2 bags of ice please and 2 or 3 black caps. Thank all of you signed not god of the bible, but the true creator
